course_details: Learn object-oriented programming in Python, covering classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Master MySQL for effective database management. Learn queries, joins, and database design principles.
Understand the fundamentals of C programming, including syntax, data types, and memory management.
Study essential algorithms and data structures, focusing on sorting, searching, and complexity analysis.
Learn C++ programming, covering syntax, object-oriented concepts, and standard library usage.
Explore software engineering principles, including software development life cycle, methodologies, and best practices.
Develop logical thinking and problem-solving skills. Learn to break down complex problems and design solutions.
Understand data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees for efficient data management.
Learn AWS services and cloud computing concepts. Covers EC2, S3, and AWS management tools.
